name: Wyvern
headline: High-res hyperspectral pictures of Earth from space
description: Wyvern is a space data company that will capture the highest resolution hyperspectral images from satellites that cost 100X less than satellites using traditional telescopes.

founders.name: Chris Robson, Founder
founders.description: Captains the [space] ship. MSc in orbital design and analysis, former AlbertaSat Project Manager, an expert in all things mechanical.

founders.name: Kurtis Broda, Founder
founders.description:
Space nerd. Passionate about building tech to help mitigate climate change.

Outside of work, I am hiking and bicycling my way through life with my partner.

founders.name: Kristen Cote, Founder
founders.description: Kristen specializes in optical imaging technology and laser-based sensing & instrumentation.

founders.name: Callie Lissinna, Founder
founders.description: Callie led in-orbit operations for the first made-in-Alberta satellite (launched 2017), accumulating over 100 hours of experience commanding the spacecraft in real time. She was Project Manager of the Ex-Alta 2 satellite mission at the University of Alberta for nearly 3 years, where she reported to the Canadian Space Agency and secured over $100k in grant funding for the mission as a student. She holds a BSc. Mechanical Engineering, Mathematics Minor.

# Reveal The Invisible Truth of Planet Earth
Uncover invisible problems in your organization’s operations with high-quality, high-resolution hyperspectral imaging from space.
[ Learn More  ](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-company/>)
# Reveal The Invisible Truth of Planet Earth
Uncover invisible problems in your business operations with high-quality, high-resolution hyperspectral imaging from Space.
[ Learn More  ](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-company/>)
  * [](http://www.wyvern.space/<#Section 1>)


## Space-Based Hyperspectral Imagery is Here
A first for the space industry, our 5 metre spatial resolution with 23 unique bands provide groundbreaking high-resolution and high-quality data for our clients.
![Hyperspectral satellite imagery of Earth from Wyvern's Dragonette satellite constellation.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Hyperspectral satellite imagery of Earth from Wyvern's Dragonette satellite constellation.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Hyperspectral satellite imagery of Earth from Wyvern's Dragonette satellite constellation.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Wyvern - Jasper CIR](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Hyperspectral satellite imagery of Earth from Wyvern's Dragonette satellite constellation.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Hyperspectral satellite imagery of Earth from Wyvern's Dragonette satellite constellation.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Hyperspectral satellite imagery of Earth from Wyvern's Dragonette satellite constellation.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Hyperspectral data science: mangrove health in Dubai.](http://www.wyvern.space)
![Debswana_TrueColor-Lower Res](http://www.wyvern.space)
Our Differentiators
[Learn More](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-company/>)
![](https://wyvern.space/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/HigherResolution-Icon-blue.png)
##### Industry Leading Resolution
Wyvern’s Dragonette constellation collects the highest spatial resolution commercial hyperspectral imaging data from low Earth orbit.
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
##### Just High-Quality Data
Wyvern is focused solely on being a provider of reliable and affordable high-quality _data_. We will not build and sell analytical solutions. 
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
##### Canadian Heritage
Wyvern is proud to be a Canadian space company, drawing on a national heritage of engineering, grit and resilience – not to mention a reputation for being quite nice to work with! 
Our Purpose
Facing climate, economic, and geopolitical challenges jeopardizing your business or national security? Current solutions fall short due to invisible issues. Wyvern offers hyperspectral data to identify and act swiftly on hidden problems. Choose Wyvern to help you make better informed decisions with detailed, up-to-date information.
[ Learn More  ](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-mission/>)
Empower your business with the most insight-rich geospatial imagery data currently available.
Our Constellation
Wyvern’s Dragonette constellation collects 5.3-metre hyperspectral imaging data from low earth orbit. The visible to near-infrared (VNIR) spectral bands in Wyvern’s hyperspectral imagery are delivered in analysis-ready format for ease of use in a variety of geospatial environments and systems.
The Dragonette constellation has three satellites on orbit taking hyperspectral images of Earth every day. With more Dragonette satellites launching soon Wyvern will be able to offer even more comprehensive global coverage.
[ Learn More  ](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-products/company-history/>)
Wyvern’s Open Data Program
Wyvern’s Open Data Program provides access to free hyperspectral imagery from the highest resolution hyperspectral constellation, [Dragonette](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-products/generation-one-hyperspectral-satellites/>). Expedite testing and validation of new applications, accelerate product development, and potentially even solve environmental issues, all with unrestricted access.
[ Access Open Data ](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/open-data/>)
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
Our Business
[Learn More](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/wyvern.space/our-company/>)
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
##### Industry Experts 
With a remarkable collective experience exceeding 100+ years in the space and geospatial sectors, Wyvern has the right team to make space-based hyperspectral image data accessible.
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
##### Customer Focused
Experts on the Wyvern team are dedicated to providing you with the data you need. We exist solely to be a provider of high-quality data.
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
##### Cost Conscious
Access cutting-edge imagery at unprecedented prices. Wyvern’s cost-effective satellites reduce your barriers to accessing high-resolution commercial hyperspectral from space.
Our Partners
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
![](http://www.wyvern.space)
[ ![](http://www.wyvern.space) ](http://www.wyvern.space/<https:/www.ansys.com/startup-program>)
Wyvern is the way decision makers address the world’s biggest challenges. Our hyperspectral data reveals the hidden reality of planet Earth.
Engage With Us
Are you ready to unlock a whole new level of insight for your organization? Our cutting-edge hyperspectral image data is here. Drop us a line.
  * 587-771-1284 
  * sales@wyvern.space


Your details are kept strictly confidential as per our Privacy Policy.

generated_description:
Wyvern is a dynamic space data company revolutionizing the way we perceive Earth's surface through high-resolution hyperspectral imaging. Founded in 2018 and hailing from Edmonton, Canada, Wyvern emerged from the Y Combinator W22 batch with a bold mission: to capture the highest-resolution hyperspectral images of Earth from space at a fraction of the cost of traditional satellite technology—up to 100 times cheaper.

The company boasts a team of 26 skilled employees, led by visionaries in the hard-tech and satellite sectors. With Aaron Epstein as their Group Partner, they are positioned at the intersection of technology and critical climate needs. Wyvern's imaging technology enables it to provide a groundbreaking spatial resolution of 5.3 meters and features 23 unique spectral bands, making their data invaluable for many applications.

What separates Wyvern from many in the field is their commitment solely to data provision. They are not in the business of selling analytical solutions but focus on delivering high-quality, reliable, and affordable data for clients in various industries, including agriculture, mining, forestry, and defense. Their flagship product, the Dragonette satellite constellation, currently includes three satellites that take daily hyperspectral images of Earth, with plans for many more.

Wyvern is also deeply committed to accessibility and innovation. They've launched an Open Data Program to provide free hyperspectral imagery to expedite research and application testing. This initiative opens doors for businesses, researchers, and decision-makers to address environmental challenges with fresh insights.

If you're grappling with issues like crop classification, invasive species management, or mine reclamation, Wyvern’s hyperspectral data could provide the clarity and precision you need. 

For more information about their offerings, you can visit their website at [Wyvern](http://www.wyvern.space).

In a world where invisible problems often go unnoticed, Wyvern is revealing the hidden truths of our planet—one image at a time.
